14/*! \file */
15
16#include <config.h>
17
18#include <string.h>
19
20#include <isc/netaddr.h>
21#include <isc/print.h>
22#include <isc/util.h>
23
24#include <dns/ecs.h>
25#include <dns/types.h>
26
27void
28dns_ecs_init(dns_ecs_t *ecs) {
29 isc_netaddr_unspec(&ecs->addr);
30 ecs->source = 0;
31 /*
32 * XXXMUKS: Fix me when resolver ECS gets merged where scope
33 * gets initialized to 0xff.
34 */
35 ecs->scope = 0;
36}
37
38void
39dns_ecs_format(dns_ecs_t *ecs, char *buf, size_t size) {
40 size_t len;
41
42 REQUIRE(ecs != NULL);
43 REQUIRE(buf != NULL);
44 REQUIRE(size >= DNS_ECS_FORMATSIZE);
45
46 isc_netaddr_format(&ecs->addr, buf, (unsigned int)size);
47 len = strlen(buf);
48 INSIST(size >= len);
49 buf += len;
50 size -= len;
51 snprintf(buf, size, "/%u/%u", ecs->source, ecs->scope);
52}
53
